/*
 * binaryaddition.c
 *
 *  Created on: 23-Feb-2014
 *      Author: Anoosh
 */

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {

	int t;

	scanf("%d", &t);

	char string[30], dummy, temp;
	int n, i;

	while(t--) {

		memset(string, 0, 30);
		scanf("%s", string);

		n = strlen(string);

		i = n - 1;

		while(string[i] != '0' && i >= 0) {

			string[i] = 48;
			i--;
		}

		if(i == -1) {

			dummy = string[0];
			string[0] = 49;

			for(i = 1; i < n + 1 ; i++) {
				temp = string[i];
				string[i] = dummy;
				dummy = temp;
			}
			string[i] = '\0';
		}
		else
			string[i] = 49;

		printf("%s\n", string);

	}

	return 0;
}
